languages.text: "Когда Вашей Светлости будет угодно принять культ, прошу дать мне знать. Я буду ожидать на мостике — как всегда к вашим услугам".
languages.translation_comment:
вигдис
выдается эрранд DeathCultIntroduction_errand, протухает в той главе, в которой выдан, после DeathCultIntroductionReminder_prompt

вигдис
выдается эрранд DeathCultIntroduction_errand, протухает в той главе, в которой выдан, после DeathCultIntroductionReminder_prompt

languages.text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."
languages.original_text: "Когда Вашей Светлости будет угодно принять культ, прошу дать мне знать. Я буду ожидать на мостике — как всегда к вашим услугам".

traits.locale_text: "When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes to receive the cultists, please let me know. I will be waiting on the bridge. At your service as always."
"When Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes to receive the cultists, please let me know. I will be waiting on the bridge. At your service as always."
"Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."
"Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."
"Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."
"Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."

languages.text: « Faites-moi savoir lorsque Votre Seigneurie sera prête à recevoir les cultistes. J'attendrai vos ordres sur le pont. Je suis, comme toujours, à votre service. »
languages.original_text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."

traits.locale_text: « Faites-moi savoir lorsque Votre Seigneurie sera prête à recevoir les cultistes. J'attendrai vos ordres sur le pont. Je suis, comme toujours, à votre service. »

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puede informarme cuando esté list{mf|o|a} para recibir a los cultistas. Como siempre, estoy a su servicio».
languages.original_text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, puede informarme cuando esté list{mf|o|a} para recibir a los cultistas. Como siempre, estoy a su servicio».

languages.text: “如果您打算见这些教派成员一面，请随时通知我，大人。我会在舰桥上等待您的命令。我随时愿为您效劳。”
languages.original_text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."

traits.locale_text: “如果您打算见这些教派成员一面，请随时通知我，大人。我会在舰桥上等待您的命令。我随时愿为您效劳。”

languages.text: 「陛下がカルトの者達を受け入れる準備ができましたら、教えてください。あなたの命令を橋から待っています。いつもと同様、あなたに仕えております」
languages.original_text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がカルトの者達を受け入れる準備ができましたら、教えてください。あなたの命令を橋から待っています。いつもと同様、あなたに仕えております」

languages.text: "Bitte lasst es mich wissen, wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bereit ist, die Kultisten zu empfangen. Ich erwarte auf der Brücke Eure Befehle. Wie immer stehe ich zu Diensten."
languages.original_text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."

traits.locale_text: "Bitte lasst es mich wissen, wenn Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bereit ist, die Kultisten zu empfangen. Ich erwarte auf der Brücke Eure Befehle. Wie immer stehe ich zu Diensten."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi Hazretleri}, tarikatçıları kabul etmeye hazır olduğunuzda lütfen beni haberdar edin. Emirlerinizi köprüde bekleyeceğim. Her zaman olduğu gibi hizmetinizdeyim."
languages.original_text: "Please let me know when Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is ready to receive the cultists. I will await your orders on the bridge. As always, I am at your service."
